verses.verse: A Psalm of David. <S%H8085>Hear<s%> my <S%H8605>prayer<s%>, O <S%H3068>Jehovah<s%>; Give <S%H238>ear<s%> to my <S%H8469>supplications<s%>: In thy <S%H530>faithfulness<s%> <S%H6030>answer<s%> <S%H6666>me<s%>, and in thy righteousness.
And <S%H935>enter<s%> not into <S%H4941>judgment<s%> with thy <S%H5650>servant<s%>; For in thy <S%H6440>sight<s%> no man <S%H2416>living<s%> is <S%H6663>righteous<s%>.

For the <S%H341>enemy<s%> hath <S%H7291>persecuted<s%> my <S%H5315>soul<s%>; He hath <S%H1792>smitten<s%> my <S%H2416>life<s%> <S%H1792>down<s%> to the <S%H776>ground<s%>: He hath made me to <S%H3427>dwell<s%> in <S%H4285>dark<s%> <S%H5769>places<s%>, as those that have been long <S%H4191>dead<s%>.
Therefore is my <S%H7307>spirit<s%> <S%H5848>overwhelmed<s%> within <S%H3820>me<s%>; My heart <S%H8432>within<s%> me is <S%H8074>desolate<s%>.
I <S%H2142>remember<s%> the <S%H3117>days<s%> of <S%H6924>old<s%>; I <S%H1897>meditate<s%> on all thy <S%H6467>doings<s%>; I <S%H7878>muse<s%> on the <S%H4639>work<s%> of thy <S%H3027>hands<s%>.
I spread <S%H6566>forth<s%> my <S%H3027>hands<s%> unto <S%H5315>thee<s%>: My soul thirsteth after <S%H5889>thee<s%>, as a weary <S%H776>land<s%>. <S%H5542><s%>[[Selah

Make <S%H4118>haste<s%> to <S%H6030>answer<s%> <S%H3068>me<s%>, O Jehovah; My <S%H7307>spirit<s%> <S%H3615>faileth<s%>: <S%H5641>Hide<s%> not thy <S%H6440>face<s%> from <S%H4911>me<s%>, Lest I become like them that go <S%H3381>down<s%> into the <S%H953>pit<s%>.

Cause me to <S%H8085>hear<s%> thy <S%H2617>lovingkindness<s%> in the <S%H1242>morning<s%>; For in thee do I <S%H982>trust<s%>: Cause me to <S%H3045>know<s%> the <S%H1870>way<s%> <S%H2098>wherein<s%> I should <S%H3212>walk<s%>; For I lift <S%H5375>up<s%> my soul unto <S%H5315>thee<s%>.
Deliver <S%H5337><s%> <S%H3068>me<s%>, O Jehovah, from mine <S%H341>enemies<s%>: I flee unto thee to hide <S%H3680>me<s%>.

Teach <S%H3925><s%> me to <S%H6213>do<s%> thy <S%H7522>will<s%>; For thou art my <S%H430>God<s%>: Thy <S%H7307>Spirit<s%> is <S%H2896>good<s%>; <S%H5148>Lead<s%> me in the <S%H776>land<s%> of <S%H4334>uprightness<s%>.
Quicken <S%H2421><s%> <S%H3068>me<s%>, O Jehovah, for thy <S%H8034>name<s%>'s <S%H6666>sake<s%>: In thy righteousness <S%H3318>bring<s%> my <S%H5315>soul<s%> out of <S%H6869>trouble<s%>.
And in thy <S%H2617>lovingkindness<s%> cut <S%H6789>off<s%> mine <S%H341>enemies<s%>, And <S%H6>destroy<s%> all them that <S%H6887>afflict<s%> my <S%H5315>soul<s%>; For I am thy <S%H5650>servant<s%>.
